charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to transport undocumented aliens w/in the U.S. PENALTY: Not more than 10 yrs and/or $250,000; $100 CVF; $5000 CVF; Not more than 3 yrs SRT.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 24 mos imprs; 3 yrs SRT; all standard and mandatory conditions of supervised release apply; Special condition: if the defendant is deported, he is not to return to the United States illegally; $100.00 Special Assessment; The Court finds the defendant is indigent and will not impose the $5,000 S/A; fine waived [because of the defendants inability to pay]; The Court will not impose order of restitution; defendant kept right to appeal however defendant is advised of right to appeal (notified of 14 day deadline); defendant was advised appeal would be free of charge. Deft to be placed in a BOP facility near Laredo.

charges.charge_description: Transport and attempt to transport undocumented aliens for financial gain. PENALTY: Not more than 10 yrs and/or $250,000; $100 CVF; $5000 CVF; Not more than 3 yrs SRT.(2-3)
